simple_studying_desc: Possibility to increasy your knowledge instead of learning from the grounds
easy_understand_desc: Possibility to easier understand both modern slavic languages and ancient ones for slavic and non-slavic people
international_communication_desc: Possibility to use the language for communication purposes with people of different slavic nations with such purposes as tourism, business, church, everyday and thematic communication
logo_desc: Interslavic portal delivers sources for learning Interslavic language. Currently main sections are under development.
page_in_progress_desc: Today you can look through some media materials
cash_settings: Cashing settings for site usage. All settings are linked to your device's browser.
transcriber_desc: Transcribing from cyrillic to latin in Interslavic
help_info: Here you can ask a question about portal, link with the developers or share your ideas about the portal
sent_ok: Your message has been successfully sent!
name: Name
